title: To the Asshole i just had the Displeasure of having on my team

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body: Learn to jungle before you complain about my warding you useless fuck

replies.body: First of all mate your build is fucking cancer and no wonder you went 2/11, the junglier even had more assists than you so pretty much he went better than you, learn the fucking game before you complain.
built that way to support my adc as much as possablie to make up for the lack of ganks from the jungler, secondly he only got more kills and assist late game under towers
Motorboat can you not be a douche its not about your score its about the love behind it, JKS you got fking rekt abyss
First off all from not my sister, the malphite fed vayne which makes her hard too kill, a fed vayne is over so stop especially if his jg is useless
Stop motorboat it wasn't abyss's fault okay it was the junglers fault
i played like shit so honestly i dont care it just pisses me off when im doing the best i can given the siuation and he does nothing
Im gonna add malphite, and flame him or her
Dont ban me riot pls, just doing your job
The jungler most probably decide not to gank your lane because your ADC bought a Sword of the Occult ... like wtf

It looked more like a team effort of playing badly, rather than just the jungles fault. 

From what I see, your adc was super up themselves and got a sword of the occult as their second item, despite having already died 5ish times before the 27min mark when they got it (like, seriously?!?). 
In general, you team comp compares poorly to theirs, your cc is sub-par and they would do better in team fights as well as making picks on you. 


As for people being little ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥ about your warding, it is something you are going to have to put up with in any level of play. People never seem to understand that they are also able to ward and that the max wards someone is ever able to have down is 3 greens, 1pink and possibly 1  blue. They also don't seem to understand that in the early game the support is hardly ever going to go roaming and ward for toplane or ward top jungle.

> [{quoted}](name=Abyss of Souls,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=BkEm4ELW,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-06-13T07:42:46.974+0000)
>
> Jinx was Mid

Jinx was mid. That was what they carved into her grave.

Good luck on your attitude mate

Because that is the worst thing about your play

Um but your warding is terrible. You put down 20 wards in a 35 minute game, you didn't upgrade your trinket or buy any pink wards when against a triple invis team????????? You should of had your trinket upgraded as soon as you hit level 9, and at least bought 5 pinks wards at the minimum. You built 3 half items without actually finishing a full item other than your support item, which really doesn't count. Yeah you should really improve your self before blaming your team mates, since all of them were better than you.
